sourcesContent:
<template>
  {{ api }}
  <el-input>
    <el-tag v-for="tag in tags" :key="tag.name" closable :type="tag.type" @close="handleClose(tag)">
      {{ tag.name }}
    </el-tag>
  </el-input>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "testPage",
  data() {
    return {
      tags: [
        {
          name: "123",
          id: 0,
        },
        {
          id: 1,
          name: "222",
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleClose(tag) {
      this.tags.splice(this.tags.indexOf(tag), 1);
    },
  },
  mounted() {},
};
</script>

<style scoped></style>
